attributes.visState: {"params": {"background_color_rules": [{"id": "8b27e6a0-8e61-11e8-b741-c3e458b74a68"}], "time_field": "@timestamp", "series": [{"terms_field": "kafka.topic.name", "value_template": "{{value}}", "seperate_axis": 0, "split_mode": "terms", "split_color_mode": "rainbow", "formatter": "number", "chart_type": "bar", "filter": {"query": "metricset.name: partition AND kafka.partition.partition.is_leader: true", "language": "lucene"}, "fill": "0.1", "label": "Topic Offsets", "metrics": [{"field": "kafka.partition.offset.newest", "type": "sum", "id": "61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417"}], "terms_order_by": "_term", "axis_position": "right", "point_size": "0", "stacked": "none", "color": "rgba(244,78,59,1)", "id": "61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "line_width": "0.5"}, {"terms_field": "kafka.consumergroup.id", "value_template": "{{value}}", "seperate_axis": 0, "split_mode": "terms", "split_color_mode": "rainbow", "formatter": "number", "chart_type": "line", "filter": {"query": "metricset.name: consumergroup", "language": "lucene"}, "split_filters": [{"id": "dd41ada0-8f1e-11e8-8784-cd0acd161a28", "color": "#68BC00"}], "fill": "0", "label": "Consumer Offsets", "metrics": [{"field": "kafka.consumergroup.offset", "type": "sum", "id": "d43034c1-8f1e-11e8-8784-cd0acd161a28"}], "terms_order_by": "_term", "axis_position": "right", "point_size": "1.5", "stacked": "none", "color": "rgba(244,78,59,0.52)", "id": "d43034c0-8f1e-11e8-8784-cd0acd161a28", "line_width": "1"}], "show_grid": 1, "index_pattern": "metricbeat-*", "filter": {"query": "NOT kafka.topic.name:__consumer_offsets", "language": "lucene"}, "axis_formatter": "number", "interval": "auto", "axis_position": "left", "show_legend": 1, "id": "61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "type": "timeseries"}, "aggs": [], "type": "metrics", "title": "Kafka Topic & Consumer Offsets [Metricbeat Kafka] ECS"}
